code: import React from"react";import{Button,Container,Image}from"react-bootstrap";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import Table from'react-bootstrap/Table';import{clear,removeFromCart}from"../../Slices/cartSlice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Cart=function Cart(){var cart=useSelector(function(state){return state.cart;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var totalPrice=cart.reduce(function(acc,product){acc+=product.price*product.quantity;return acc;},0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"my-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"mb-3",children:"Welcome To Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"my-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",onClick:function onClick(){dispatch(clear());},children:" Clear"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{children:["Total Price : ",totalPrice.toFixed(2),"$"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{striped:true,bordered:true,hover:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"#"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Quantity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Action"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:cart.map(function(product){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:product.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:product.image,style:{width:'100px',height:'100px'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[product.price,"$"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:product.quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"danger",onClick:function onClick(){dispatch(removeFromCart(product));},children:"Remove"})})]},product.id);})})]})]});};export default Cart;
